title: Blake Lively vs Justin Baldoni: $400M Lawsuit Turns Into Hollywood's Ugliest War
shortdescription: It Ends With Us feud goes nuclear – extortion, defamation & Ryan Reynolds in the crossfire!
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: What began as whispers of on-set tension has detonated into a $400 million legal bloodbath. Blake Lively has accused Justin Baldoni of sexual harassment and creating a hostile work environment during It Ends With Us — while Baldoni fired back with a countersuit claiming Lively and Ryan Reynolds orchestrated a calculated smear campaign to destroy his career.
Leaked text messages, secretly recorded Zoom calls, and allegations of extortion have flooded the courts. Sources say Reynolds himself has been subpoenaed and will be forced to testify.

Baldoni has been dropped by his agency, his director’s cut of the film shelved indefinitely, and sponsors are fleeing. Meanwhile, Lively’s team claims this is the biggest #MeToo reckoning since Weinstein.
